title: No. 42 Chair Ash/Charcoal Grey
body:
Classic No. 42 Chair by iconic mid-century Danish furniture designer Kai Kristiansen, renowned for his organic, smooth tables, cabinets and chairs.
The No. 42 Chair was one of Kia Kristiansen's more popular designs, lasting the test of time. mobelaris.com offers this classic No .42 chair in a flawless Ash finished in natural matt oil, protecting the wood and sustaining the natural beauty, the cushion is upholstered with commercial quality Cotton and Polyester fabric with cushion is UK safety fire foam.
